localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

sharedContent.title:
BIDEN: Our country is “doomed.”

“Not just because of African Americans.”

But because “white Europeans” will be the minority and the “Hispanics” will be the majority by 2040. https://t.co/8oYe6SIVEr
sharedContent.author: Rep. Steven Smith (R-GA) 🇺🇸

localize.quoted_status_full_text:
拜登：我们的国家“完蛋了”。

“不仅仅是因为非洲裔美国人。”

而是因为到2040年，“欧洲白人”将成为少数，而“拉美裔”将成为多数。https://t.co/8oYe6SIVEr

拜登：我們的國家“完蛋了”。

“不僅僅是因爲非洲裔美國人。”

而是因爲到2040年，“歐洲白人”將成爲少數，而“拉美裔”將成爲多數。https://t.co/8oYe6SIVEr
